understand, everything I did was to keep you and the twins safe."
search_results.title: JBoard.tv  View topic - Monday, October 10, 2011 Game Recap ...

question: "Please, Lily, understand, everything I did was to keep you and the twins safe.""Cane, you pretended that you were dead and made me think that I was sleeping with a ghost.  I ended up in an insane asylum.  You're..."...this 10-letter adjective from the Latin for "look down on" (& favored by Daffy Duck on occasion)
